text: Valerio Sozzi (born 6 December 1968) is an Italian equestrian. He competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Italy Category:Equestrians at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy
title: Valerio Sozzi
